short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Oasis Proxy is a proxy management extension tool similar to SwitchyOmega, supporting Manifest v3.
short.zh_CN: Oasis Proxy是一款类似于SwitchyOmega，支持Manifest v3的代理管理扩展工具。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
OasisProxy is a browser proxy management extension similar to SwitchyOmega, supporting Chrome Manifest v3. With OasisProxy, users can easily configure and manage browser proxies.

Features:
- Support for Proxy Server proxies for HTTP/HTTPS/SOCKS protocols
- Support for PAC script proxies, Automatic policy proxies
- Support for incognito mode usage
- Support automatic synchronization of proxy configuration.
- Support for debugger proxy rules and policies by the Requests Debugger Monitor

Reference for change logs:
https://github.com/oasis-proxy/oasis-proxy/blob/main/changelogs.md

Reference for WIKI:
https://github.com/oasis-proxy/oasis-proxy/wiki
long.zh_CN:
OasisProxy 是一款类似于 SwitchyOmega 的浏览器代理管理扩展，支持 Chrome Manifest v3。使用OasisProxy，用户可以轻松配置和管理浏览器代理。

主要功能：
- 支持HTTP/HTTPS/SOCK的Proxy Server代理
- 支持PAC脚本代理，支持引用Proxy Server的自动策略代理
- 支持隐身模式使用
- 支持自动同步代理配置
- 支持通过请求查看器调试代理规则和策略

版本功能ChangeLogs参考：
https://github.com/oasis-proxy/oasis-proxy/blob/main/changelogs-zh_CN.md

WIKI参考：
https://github.com/oasis-proxy/oasis-proxy/wiki
